alert.note: Alert for Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 10:57PM CDT until June 07 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1057 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northwest of Hooker, or 14 miles southeast of Feterita, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Hooker and Tyrone. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
